content:
{"name": "Southwest Catholic Social Services - SNAP Assistance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://www.pa.gov/content/dam/copapwp-pagov/en/dhs/documents/services/assistance/documents/snap/PA-1990-SunBucks-Application.pdf
Southwest Philadelphia Family Service Center (Catholic Social Services) assists with SNAP application to receive EBT/food stamps. 

You may be assisted in person or over-the-phone depending on the distance of applicant. 

Confirm the documents to be brought for application in-person. 

Application may take up to 1 week.", "email": "", "url": "https://cssphiladelphia.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6214 Grays Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Southwest Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19142", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9242529, "longitude": -75.23049499999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(267) 995-1062", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
